Comparison Table","archetype":"container","data":{"animateOnScroll":{"dataType":"booleanValue","displayName":"Animate on Scroll","defaultValue":true,"group":"Animation"},"staggerDelay":{"dataType":"select","displayName":"Stagger Delay (ms)","defaultValue":"80","options":["50","80","100","120"],"group":"Animation"},"backgroundColor":{"dataType":"color","displayName":"Background","defaultValue":"#FAFAFA","group":"Colors"},"headerBg":{"dataType":"color","displayName":"Header Background","defaultValue":"#495057","group":"Colors"},"headerText":{"dataType":"color","displayName":"Header Text","defaultValue":"#FFFFFF","group":"Colors"},"rowBg":{"dataType":"color","displayName":"Row Background","defaultValue":"#FFFFFF","group":"Colors"},"textColor":{"dataType":"color","displayName":"Text Color","defaultValue":"#212529","group":"Colors"},"accentColor":{"dataType":"color","displayName":"Accent Color","defaultValue":"#495057","group":"Colors"}},"layout":{"resizeDirection":"horizontalAndVertical","contentResizeDirection":"vertical"}}};function Component({config={}}){const[visibleRows,setVisibleRows]=React.useState(new Set());const animateOnScroll=config?.animateOnScroll!==false;const staggerDelay=parseInt(config?.staggerDelay||"80");const features=[{name:"Unlimited Projects",basic:true,pro:true,enterprise:true},{name:"Team Collaboration",basic:false,pro:true,enterprise:true},{name:"Advanced Analytics",basic:false,pro:true,enterprise:true},{name:"Priority Support",basic:false,pro:false,enterprise:true},{name:"Custom Integrations",basic:false,pro:false,enterprise:true},{name:"SSO & SAML",basic:false,pro:false,enterprise:true}];React.useEffect(()=>{if(!animateOnScroll){features.forEach((_,i)=>setVisibleRows(prev=>new Set([...prev,i])));return;}const observer=new IntersectionObserver((entries)=>{entries.forEach(entry=>{if(entry.isIntersecting){const index=parseInt(entry.target.dataset.index);setTimeout(()=>{setVisibleRows(prev=>new Set([...prev,index]));},index*staggerDelay);}});},{threshold:0.5});document.querySelectorAll('[data-feature-row]').forEach(el=>observer.observe(el));return()=>observer.disconnect();},[animateOnScroll,staggerDelay]);return
Feature
Basic
Pro
Enterprise
{features.map((f,i)=>{const isVisible=visibleRows.has(i);const slideDir=i%2===0?'-40px':'40px';return
{f.name}

const MANIFEST={"type":"Grid.Magnetic","description":"Grid where hovering one card causes neighbors to move away (magnetic repulsion)","editorElement":{"selector":".magnetic-grid","displayName":"Magnetic Repulsion Grid","archetype":"container","data":{"columns":{"dataType":"select","displayName":"Columns","defaultValue":"3","options":["2","3","4"],"group":"Layout"},"gap":{"dataType":"select","displayName":"Gap","defaultValue":"24","options":["16","20","24","32"],"group":"Layout"},"repulsionStrength":{"dataType":"select","displayName":"Repulsion Strength","defaultValue":"20","options":["10","15","20","25","30"],"group":"Animation"},"backgroundColor":{"dataType":"color","displayName":"Background","defaultValue":"#F8F9FA","group":"Colors"},"cardBackground":{"dataType":"color","displayName":"Card Background","defaultValue":"#FFFFFF","group":"Colors"},"textColor":{"dataType":"color","displayName":"Text Color","defaultValue":"#212529","group":"Colors"},"borderColor":{"dataType":"color","displayName":"Border Color","defaultValue":"#E9ECEF","group":"Colors"}},"layout":{"resizeDirection":"horizontalAndVertical","contentResizeDirection":"vertical"}}};function Component({config={}}){const[hoveredIndex,setHoveredIndex]=React.useState(null);const[flippedIndices,setFlippedIndices]=React.useState(new Set());const columns=parseInt(config?.columns||"3");const gap=parseInt(config?.gap||"24");const repulsion=parseInt(config?.repulsionStrength||"20");const items=Array.from({length:9},(_,i)=>({title:`Project ${i+1}`,desc:"Innovative solution",img:`https://images.unsplash.com/photo-${1500000000000+i*50000000}?w=600&h=400&fit=crop`}));const getOffset=(index)=>{if(hoveredIndex===null)return{x:0,y:0};const hoveredRow=Math.floor(hoveredIndex/columns);const hoveredCol=hoveredIndex%columns;const row=Math.floor(index/columns);const col=index%columns;const dx=col-hoveredCol;const dy=row-hoveredRow;const distance=Math.sqrt(dx*dx+dy*dy);if(distance===0)return{x:0,y:0};const force=repulsion/distance;return{x:dx*force,y:dy*force};};return
{items.map((item,i)=>{const offset=getOffset(i);const isFlipped=flippedIndices.has(i);return
setHoveredIndex(i)}onMouseLeave={()=>setHoveredIndex(null)}onClick={()=>setFlippedIndices(prev=>{const next=new Set(prev);next.has(i)?next.delete(i):next.add(i);return next;})}style={{aspectRatio:'4/3',backgroundColor:config?.cardBackground||'#FFFFFF',borderRadius:'12px',border:`1px solid ${config?.borderColor||'#E9ECEF'}`,overflow:'hidden',cursor:'pointer',transform:`translate(${offset.x}px,${offset.y}px) ${isFlipped?'rotateY(180deg)':'rotateY(0deg)'}`,transition:'transform 400ms cubic-bezier(0.34,1.56,0.64,1)',transformStyle:'preserve-3d',position:'relative',boxShadow:hoveredIndex===i?'0 12px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)':'0 4px 12px rgba(0,0,0,0.08)'}}>

{item.title}

{item.desc}

Click to flip back
;})}
;};

Mode","defaultValue":"scroll","options":["scroll","immediate"],"group":"Animation"},"countDuration":{"dataType":"select","displayName":"Count Duration (ms)","defaultValue":"2000","options":["1500","2000","2500","3000"],"group":"Animation"},"backgroundColor":{"dataType":"color","displayName":"Background","defaultValue":"#F8F9FA","group":"Colors"},"cardBackground":{"dataType":"color","displayName":"Card Color","defaultValue":"#212529","group":"Colors"},"accentColor":{"dataType":"color","displayName":"Accent Color","defaultValue":"#495057","group":"Colors"},"graphColor":{"dataType":"color","displayName":"Graph Line Color","defaultValue":"#495057","group":"Colors"}},"layout":{"resizeDirection":"horizontalAndVertical","contentResizeDirection":"vertical"}}};function Component({config={}}){const[animatedCards,setAnimatedCards]=React.useState(new Set());const[currentValues,setCurrentValues]=React.useState({});const containerRef=React.useRef(null);const triggerMode=config?.triggerMode||"scroll";const countDuration=parseInt(config?.countDuration||"2000");const stats=[{label:"Revenue",value:2450000,prefix:"$",suffix:"M",data:[20,45,35,75,55,80,65,90,85,95]},{label:"Users",value:145000,prefix:"",suffix:"K",data:[10,20,18,35,40,55,50,70,75,85]},{label:"Projects",value:8350,prefix:"",suffix:"",data:[30,35,40,45,55,60,65,75,80,85]},{label:"Efficiency",value:94,prefix:"",suffix:"%",data:[50,55,60,58,70,75,80,85,90,94]},{label:"Growth",value:156,prefix:"+",suffix:"%",data:[60,65,75,80,85,95,100,110,135,156]},{label:"NPS Score",value:87,prefix:"",suffix:"",data:[70,72,75,78,80,82,84,85,86,87]}];React.useEffect(()=>{if(triggerMode==='immediate'){stats.forEach((_,i)=>setTimeout(()=>animateCard(i),i*100));return;}const observer=new IntersectionObserver((entries)=>{entries.forEach(entry=>{if(entry.isIntersecting){stats.forEach((_,i)=>setTimeout(()=>animateCard(i),i*100));}});},{threshold:0.3});if(containerRef.current)observer.observe(containerRef.current);return()=>observer.disconnect();},[triggerMode]);const animateCard=(index)=>{setAnimatedCards(prev=>new Set([...prev,index]));const stat=stats[index];const startTime=Date.now();const animate=()=>{const elapsed=Date.now()-startTime;const progress=Math.min(elapsed/countDuration,1);const eased=1-Math.pow(1-progress,3);const value=Math.round(eased*stat.value);setCurrentValues(prev=>({...prev,[index]:value}));if(progress<1)requestAnimationFrame(animate);};requestAnimationFrame(animate);};return
{stats.map((stat,i)=>{const isAnimated=animatedCards.has(i);const value=currentValues[i]||0;return
{stat.label}
{stat.prefix}{value<1000?value:value<1000000?(value/1000).toFixed(1):( value/1000000).toFixed(2)}{stat.suffix}
;})}
;};

End","defaultValue":"#A1A1AA","group":"Colors"},"textColor":{"dataType":"color","displayName":"Text Color","defaultValue":"#FAFAFA","group":"Colors"}},"layout":{"resizeDirection":"horizontalAndVertical","contentResizeDirection":"vertical"}}};function Component({config={}}){const[hasStarted,setHasStarted]=React.useState(false);const[progress,setProgress]=React.useState({});const containerRef=React.useRef(null);const size=parseInt(config?.size||"320");const strokeWidth=parseInt(config?.strokeWidth||"16");const gap=parseInt(config?.gap||"12");const duration=parseInt(config?.animationDuration||"2000");const rings=[{label:"Revenue",target:87},{label:"Users",target:92},{label:"Engagement",target:76},{label:"Satisfaction",target:94}];React.useEffect(()=>{const observer=new IntersectionObserver((entries)=>{entries.forEach(entry=>{if(entry.isIntersecting&&!hasStarted){setHasStarted(true);rings.forEach((ring,i)=>{const start=Date.now();const animate=()=>{const eased=1-Math.pow(1-p,3);setProgress(prev=>({...prev,[i]:eased*ring.target}));if(p<1)requestAnimationFrame(animate);};setTimeout(()=>requestAnimationFrame(animate),i*200);});}});},{threshold:0.3});if(containerRef.current)observer.observe(containerRef.current);return()=>observer.disconnect();},[hasStarted,duration]);const getRadius=(index)=>size/2-strokeWidth/2-(strokeWidth+gap)*index;return
{Math.round(rings.reduce((sum,_,i)=>sum+(progress[i]||0),0)/rings.length)}%

lineThickness=parseInt(config?.lineThickness||"3");const steps=Array.from({length:totalSteps},(_,i)=>({number:i+1,label:["Personal Info","Contact","Preferences","Payment","Confirmation"][i]||`Step ${i+1}`}));const getNodeStyle=(step)=>{const isCompleted=stepcurrentStep;let bg,color,scale,pulse;if(isCompleted){bg=config?.completedColor||'#28A745';color='#FFFFFF';scale=1;pulse=false;}else if(isCurrent){bg=config?.currentColor||'#495057';color='#FFFFFF';scale=1.15;pulse=true;}else{bg=config?.futureColor||'#CED4DA';color=config?.textColor||'#212529';scale=0.9;pulse=false;}return{width:`${nodeSize}px`,height:`${nodeSize}px`,borderRadius:'50%',backgroundColor:bg,color,display:'flex',alignItems:'center',justifyContent:'center',fontSize:'16px',fontWeight:'500',transition:'all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.34,1.56,0.64,1)',transform:`scale(${scale})`,boxShadow:isCurrent?`0 0 0 4px ${bg}20, 0 4px 12px ${bg}40`:'0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)',animation:pulse?'pulse 2s ease-in-out infinite':'none',zIndex:2,position:'relative'};};return

const MANIFEST={"type":"UI.Card3DStack","description":"3D card stack carousel that fans on hover and brings clicked card to front","editorElement":{"selector":".card-3d-stack","displayName":"3D Card Stack Carousel","archetype":"container","data":{"cardCount":{"dataType":"select","displayName":"Number of Cards","defaultValue":"5","options":["3","4","5","6","7"],"group":"Content"},"fanAngle":{"dataType":"select","displayName":"Fan Angle (degrees)","defaultValue":"15","options":["10","15","20","25"],"group":"Animation"},"depthOffset":{"dataType":"select","displayName":"Depth Offset","defaultValue":"40","options":["30","35","40","45","50"],"group":"Animation"},"backgroundColor":{"dataType":"color","displayName":"Background","defaultValue":"#18181B","group":"Colors"},"cardBackground":{"dataType":"color","displayName":"Card Background","defaultValue":"#FFFFFF","group":"Colors"},"textColor":{"dataType":"color","displayName":"Text Color","defaultValue":"#212529","group":"Colors"},"accentColor":{"dataType":"color","displayName":"Accent Color","defaultValue":"#495057","group":"Colors"}},"layout":{"resizeDirection":"horizontalAndVertical","contentResizeDirection":"vertical"}}};function Component({config={}}){const[isFanned,setIsFanned]=React.useState(false);const[activeIndex,setActiveIndex]=React.useState(0);const cardCount=parseInt(config?.cardCount||"5");const fanAngle=parseInt(config?.fanAngle||"15");const depthOffset=parseInt(config?.depthOffset||"40");const cards=Array.from({length:cardCount},(_,i)=>({title:`Project ${i+1}`,desc:"Innovative solution for modern challenges",image:`https://images.unsplash.com/photo-${1500000000000+i*100000000}?w=600&h=400&fit=crop`}));const getCardStyle=(index)=>{const isActive=index===activeIndex;const position=index-activeIndex;if(isActive){return{transform:'translateZ(0px) rotateY(0deg) scale(1)',zIndex:100,opacity:1};}if(isFanned){const angle=position*fanAngle;const z=Math.abs(position)*-depthOffset;return{transform:`translateZ(${z}px) rotateY(${angle}deg) scale(${1-Math.abs(position)*0.1})`,zIndex:50-Math.abs(position),opacity:1};}const z=position*-20;return{transform:`translateZ(${z}px) scale(${1-Math.abs(position)*0.05})`,zIndex:50-Math.abs(position),opacity:position<=0?1:0.5};};return
setIsFanned(true)}onMouseLeave={()=>setIsFanned(false)}className="card-3d-stack">
{cards.map((card,i)=>
setActiveIndex(i)}style={{position:'absolute',top:0,left:0,width:'100%',height:'100%',backgroundColor:config?.cardBackground||'#FFFFFF',borderRadius:'16px',overflow:'hidden',cursor:'pointer',transition:'all 600ms cubic-bezier(0.34,1.56,0.64,1)',transformStyle:'preserve-3d',boxShadow:'0 20px 60px rgba(0,0,0,0.4)',border:`1px solid ${config?.accentColor||'#495057'}22`,...getCardStyle(i)}}>

{card.title}

{card.desc}

)}
;};
